## AdjacencyMatrix.laplacianMat() method

Returns this graph's Laplacian matrix: `L = D - A` Where `D` is the degree matrix and `A` this adjacency matrix.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
laplacianMat(deg?: CSR): CSR;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  deg | <code>CSR</code> | degree type for <code>degreeMat()</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

`CSR`
